description: Mic checks, dictation fix, p-value chart batch markers

changes.description: Response summary mic checks: use call_preflight_result for main/practice, state or permissionState for feedback
Dictation: stop previous on switch, avoid double upload on aborted
Stat analysis: p-value progress chart N on x-axis with batch markers

description: Changelog scope & batch, reviewed/flagged, replay, feedback UX, guest mode, RLS

changes.description: Changelog: description, active batch, scope; release checklist; create batch from changelog
Allow archiving no-consent feedback; fix delete with RLS policy
Reviewed/flagged per response, batch reviewed badge, create-new-batch prompt
Experiment Settings: batch response counts respect Data Source filter
Show recording length as minutes:seconds only (no decimals)
Feedback: recording-first UX, cumulative 20s, scroll hint, toast improvements
Only mark call error for actual errors, not normal call_end
Allow Space in inputs/textareas; skip Space+R shortcut when focus in editable field
PETS subtitles: ER = Emotional Responsiveness, UT = Understanding and Trust
Rich guest mode experience with demo responses and statistics
Source filter and baseline balance diagnostics on statistics page
Replay marker list: remove draft autosave, show all markers with timestamps
Replay timeline markers not showing after background loading refactor
Progressive session replay loading with streaming batches
Session replay loading for heavy participants with paginated fetching
Session replay & journey timeline timeouts for heavy participants
ResponseDetails performance and logging

description: Changelog: link release date to active batch, sort by date + tie-break

changes.description: Changelog: link release date to active batch (from experiment_batches), fix sort by date + tie-break by version/created_at
